Contact Related Information:
Contact George Brown College for information sessions, domestic and international admissions, fees, financial aid, and program advice:
- Domestic Admissions: admissions@georgebrown.ca or Admissions section
- International Students: Book a virtual meeting or submit an inquiry from the International Contact Us page
- Financial Aid: FinAid@georgebrown.ca or Financial Aid section
- Entry Advising: Make an appointment to see an Entry Advisor and review frequently asked questions
- Centre for Business: business@georgebrown.ca (Phone: 416-415-5000 ext. 2160) for general inquiries or contact Tracey Britt (tbritt1@georgebrown.ca) or Carolyn Fallis (cfallis@georgebrown.ca) for program-specific information.
